item.title: Paramount Skydance Said to Eye Warner Bros.
item.description: Paramount Skydance Corp., the Hollywood studio taken over in August by independent filmmaker David Ellison, is preparing a bid for rival Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., according to a person with knowled
